movies.title: Appleseed Ex Machina
movies.plot: When a paramilitary task force called E.S.W.A.T. and its operations in the year 2133 Olympus, a futuristic utopia where humans, cyborgs, and bio-engineered human beings called "Bioroids" are attempting to live in perfect harmony. However, a series of random terrorist attacks perpetrated by cyborgs and humans alike threaten to throw Olympus into total chaos. As it turns out, these humans and machines have come under the influence of an unknown electronic signal that hacks into their nervous systems and they then become the unwilling servants of a malevolent computerized entity. Thrown into the action is the plucky female E.S.W.A.T. warrior Deunan Knute and her cyborg lover/partner Briareos as they investigate these bizarre occurrences with the other members of their unit. Things become complicated when a bioroid named Tereus, who resembles Briareous in his human form, joins their unit and threatens to come between their relationship. But these three must put aside their differences to ...
movies.simplePlot: With Brialeos convalescing after a mission, Deunan is assigned a new and remarkably familiar partner as a strange wave of terrorist attacks plague Olympus.

biography.bio: Ai Kobayashi was born on May 25, 1973 in Adachi-ku, Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Appleseed (2004), Appleseed Ex Machina (2007) and Cowboy Bebop: The Movie (2001).
biography.name: Ai Kobayashi

biography.bio: Yamadera is a famous Japanese voice artist and actor, born 17 June 1961 in Miyagi, Japan. A graduate from Tohoku Gakuin University's economics school, he is affiliated with Across Entertainment. Before that, he was affiliated with the Tokyo Actor's Consumer's Cooperative Society. He is very prolific voice artist that specializes in video games, television, animation theater and others. He was the manager of the Tagajo Senior High School basketball team before he started a voice over career. His voice-acting debut was the OVA Megazone 23 (1985) as the motorcycle-riding Shinji Nakagawa, while his television debut was the anime Bosco Adventure (1986) as the cowardly, but friendly Otter. Yamadera's break-out role as an voice artist was the anime Ranma 1/2 (1989), in which he played the dual role of Hibiki Ryoga and the Jusenkyo Guide. The same year, he voiced Shaman in giant robot anime TV series Granzort (1989). In 1991, Yamadera joined forces with Toshihiko Seki and Noriko Hidaka to form the acting unit Banana Fritters, which disbanded in 1995. On the October of 1997, Yamadera became a host on the TV Tokyo children's variety show Oha Suta. In 1994 Yamadera married Mika Kanai and they stayed married for twelve years until divorcing on the spring of 2006. Their divorce was revealed in 2007. Today, Kanai lives in 4-story house, while Yamadera lives in apartment in Tokyo. Yamadera is best known for his roles in Kaiketsu Zorori (Zorori), the Japanese dub of Full House (Joey Gladstone), Ranma 1/2 (Ryoga Hibiki/P-Chan, Jusenkyo Guide), Soreike! Anpanman (Cheese, Kabao, Kamameshidon), Brave Exkaiser (Osamu Tokuda),in highly popular Ghost in the Shell (1995)/Ghost in the Shell: Innocence (2004) (Togusa), Neon Genesis Evangelion (Ryoji Kaji), Cowboy Bebop (Spike Spiegel), the Yatterman remake (Narrator, Yatter-Wan, Odatebuta), Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack (Gyunei Guss), Paprika (2006) as Osanai Morio and in highly popular Vampire Hunter D - Bloodlust (2000) as Meier Link. He is also known for dubbing such actors as Jim Carrey and Eddie Murphy in foreign language films.
biography.name: Kôichi Yamadera

biography.bio: Yûji Kishi was born on September 28, 1970 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor and manager, known for Gekisou Sentai Carranger (1996), Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005) and Appleseed Ex Machina (2007). He was previously married to Mika Kikuchi.
biography.name: Yûji Kishi

biography.bio: Kong Kuwata was born on August 23, 1961 in Osaka, Japan. He is an actor, known for Appleseed Ex Machina (2007), Blades of Blood: Samurai Shodown III (1995) and Fatal Fury 3: Road to the Final Victory (1995).
biography.name: Kong Kuwata

biography.bio: Shinpachi Tsuji was born on October 20, 1956 in Chiba, Japan as Shinichi Kotani. He is an actor, known for Perfect Blue (1997), Kiki's Delivery Service (1989) and Appleseed Ex Machina (2007).
biography.name: Shinpachi Tsuji

biography.bio: Gara Takashima was born on March 2, 1955 in Tokyo, Japan as Yumiko Takashima. She is an actress, known for Ninja Scroll (1993), Appleseed Ex Machina (2007) and Anne of Green Gables (1979).
biography.name: Gara Takashima

biography.bio: Rei Igarashi is an actress, known for Appleseed Ex Machina (2007), Welcome to the Space Show (2010) and Lain (1998). She is married to Shô Hayami.
biography.name: Rei Igarashi

biography.bio: Rica Fukami was born on August 8, 1963 in Saitama, Japan. She is an actress, known for Macross Plus (1994), Appleseed Ex Machina (2007) and Sailor Moon S the Movie: Hearts in Ice (1994). She is married to Eisuke Tsuda.
biography.name: Rica Fukami

biography.bio: Takaya Hashi was born on September 8, 1952 in Tokyo, Japan as Takaya Kato. He is an actor, known for Kiki's Delivery Service (1989), Metropolis (2001) and Fist of the North Star (1984).
biography.name: Takaya Hashi

biography.bio: Miyuki Sawashiro was born on June 2, 1985 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Hunter x Hunter (2011), Tegamibachi (2009) and Appleseed Ex Machina (2007).
biography.name: Miyuki Sawashiro

biography.bio: Yasuyuki Kase was born on March 14, 1971 in Tokyo, Japan. He is known for his work on Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Naruto (2002) and Appleseed Ex Machina (2007).
biography.name: Yasuyuki Kase

biography.bio: Takaya Kuroda was born on April 17, 1967 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Rumbling Squadron Boukenger (2006), Appleseed Ex Machina (2007) and Rainbow: Nishakubou no shichinin (2010).
biography.name: Takaya Kuroda

biography.bio: Naoko Kouda was born on March 22, 1959 in Hokkaido, Japan. She is an actress, known for Appleseed Ex Machina (2007), Lupin the Third Bye Bye, Lady Liberty (1989) and Valkyrie Profile (1999).
biography.name: Naoko Kouda

biography.bio: Atsushi Imaruoka was born on May 23, 1972 in Gunma, Japan. He is an actor, known for Appleseed Ex Machina (2007), Uncharted 2: Among Thieves (2009) and Tenkai Knights: Brave Battle (2014).
biography.name: Atsushi Imaruoka

biography.bio: Ken Yamaguchi was born on April 24, 1956 in Fukushima, Japan. He is known for his work on Appleseed Ex Machina (2007), Dragon Ball Z: The World's Strongest (1990) and Armored Fleet Dairugger XV (1982). He died on October 24, 2011 in Japan.
biography.name: Ken Yamaguchi
